com.wizzer.mle.math.MlTransform

      Create an identity transform.
      MlTransform MlTransform.inverse()
      This method finds the inverse of an affine matrix.

      Multiplies matrix by given matrix on right: this = this * m.

      Multiply the supplied transforms, and return a new one containing the result.

      Multiplies matrix by given matrix on right: this = this * trans.
      MlTransform MlTransform.transpose()
      Calculate the transpose of the matrix.
      Methods in com.wizzer.mle.math with parameters of type MlTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean MlTransform.equals(MlTransform trans, float tolerance)
      Equality comparison within given tolerance, for each component.
      boolean MlTransform.factor(MlTransform r, MlVector3 s, MlTransform u, MlVector3 t, MlTransform proj)
      Factors a matrix m into 5 pieces: m = r s r^ u t, where r^ means transpose of r, and r and u are rotations, s is a scale, and t is a translation.
      void MlRotation.getValue(MlTransform matrix)
      Returns corresponding 4x3 rotation matrix.
      MlTransform MlTransform.mul(MlTransform m)
      Multiplies matrix by given matrix on right: this = this * m.
      static MlTransform MlTransform.mul(MlTransform left, MlTransform right)
      Multiply the supplied transforms, and return a new one containing the result.
      MlTransform MlTransform.mulLeft(MlTransform trans)
      Multiplies matrix by given matrix on left.
      MlTransform MlTransform.mulRight(MlTransform trans)
      Multiplies matrix by given matrix on right: this = this * trans.
      void MlTransform.setValue(MlTransform m)
      Set the value of the transform based on the specified MlTransform.
      MlRotation MlRotation.setValue(MlTransform m)
      Sets the value of the rotation from a transform matrix.
